nodes.text: Centuries before the Galactic Civil War, entrepreneur Ecclessis Figg established a new trade route running between the planets Lutrillia and Darlyn Boda in the Greater Javin region of the Outer Rim Territories. The route helped cap Figg's legacy after having previously blazed the Lutrillian Cross and Nothoiin Corridor through the region's formerly impenetrable Twin Nebulae.

This hyperlane appears, nameless, on the Greater Javin maps appearing in both the Wizards of the Coast roleplaying game scenario Galactic Gazetteer: Hoth and the Greater Javin and The Essential Atlas reference book. Only Galactic Gazetteer refers to this route in any specific terms, identifying it as "the Rimward route to Lutrillia," in relation to the planet Darlyn Boda's intersection point with the Corellian Trade Spine.
